messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Gov. school starting
messages.msgSnippet: ... Stay up late watching movies, sleep late in the morning, and make a different kind of pancakes for breakfast every day.  Go fun places OR stay in pajamas
messages.messageBody:
8/23/03 20:56:

> My mom is coming to West Virginia for a month, and I am thinking of asking
> her to take Kelsey back to Texas with her for a couple of weeks as a treat and
> an eyeopener (she definately couldn't do that if she were in school) Any
> other
> ideas?

Stay up late watching movies, sleep late in the morning, and make a
different kind of pancakes for breakfast every day. Go fun places OR stay
in pajamas and watch tv and play video games all day. Get dressed at 2 so
she can go out and find her friends when school gets out. Bake cookies with
her to take out to her friends. Plan cool daytrips, find a pool that's
still open and go swimming or go to Berkeley Hot Springs for the day!
Invite her friends to take a day off school to go on YOUR cool trips.

Have a great year!
brenda
